title: Ep 279: Carlos Mencia
itunes:title: Ep 279: Carlos Mencia
description:
We talk Honduras dugout canoes, the times Carlos made Bobby cry, going on stage with pantyhose in your pocket, and what it's like being the most hated comedian in America.
